short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save items you find when hunting for that specific one.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes I look for something to buy, something that I need or want, like a new keyboard, shoes, headphones...
This tool will help you keep the items/products that you find during your research, keeping a simple and easy GUI.
Some people also use it to save temporary pages that they find online.

Feature:
- Save page link.
- Remove page link.
- Clean research results.
- Sync through browsers.
